system
Class ComputerProxy

java.lang.Object
  system.ComputerProxy

public class ComputerProxy
extends java.lang.Object

For every Computer instance that registers with the compute space (Space), there is a proxy maintained by the space. This allows the compute space to maintain multiple threads for each instance of registered Computer objects. This class is responsible for maintaining all Task objects queued in the registered remote computers. Each proxy maintains a queue of tasks that are currently being executed in the underlying remote machine or are queued locally in the remote machine. These tasks can either represent the Divide phase or the Conquer phase in the Divide and conquer algorithm.

Author:
Manasa Chandrasekhar, Kowshik Prakasam
